ygData.subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: I m assuming Dracona s base is outside of the alliance base because it would be physically impossible to get it inside unless the base was only four or five

I'm assuming Dracona's base is outside of the alliance base because it would 
be physically impossible to get it inside unless the base was only four or 
five times as big as Dracona, which would make it a pretty small and cramped 
base. If her base is outside, Dracona couldn't have gotten to it because the 
doors were jammed. She also had autoguns firing at her at the time, so trying 
to get the door open would be very costly.
